attributes.name: lang
attributes.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

attributes.name: ns
attributes.description:
The namespace to look for the translations in. We use this property to
sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

properties.description:

translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"en"`

sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

properties.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

properties.name: ns

**Example:** `"admin"`

tags.name: foxy-donation
tags.description: A custom element providing customizable donation forms.

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description:
**Required** 3-letter lowercase currency code.

**Example:** `"usd"`

attributes.name: amount
attributes.description:
**Required** donation amount in specified currency. When more than one amount option
is available, this field will contain the selected amount. This value is deliberately not
limited to the predefined options: whatever you set it to will show up in the cart.

**Example:** `25`

attributes.name: store
attributes.description:
**Required** store subdomain. This is usually the part after before `.foxycart.com`
and after `https://`, e.g. the `foxy-demo` bit of `https://foxy-demo.foxycart.com`.

**Example:** `"foxy-demo"`

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
**Required** product name for this donation. This will show up in the cart when this form is submitted.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"One-time donation"`

attributes.name: custom
attributes.description:
Optional parts of the form including a custom ("other") option.
Adding `amount` to this array will enable custom amount and adding `designation`
will render a custom designation field.

**Example:** `["amount", "designation"]`

attributes.name: amounts
attributes.description:
Optional donation amount variants. If this property is set, the form will render
the amount selection interface. If this array includes the value of the `amount` property,
it will be pre-selected in the form.

**Example:** `[25, 50, 75]`

attributes.name: frequency
attributes.description:
Optional donation frequency string encoded as count (integer) + units (one
of: `d` for days, `w` for weeks, `m` for months, `y` for years). A special
value for twice a month is also supported: `.5m`. If set, the form will
create a subscription with the specified frequency in the cart. This value is deliberately not
limited to the predefined options: whatever you set it to will show up in the cart.

**Example:** `"1m"`

attributes.name: frequencies
attributes.description:
Optional donation frequency variants in the same format as `frequency`. If this property is set,
the form will render the frequency selection interface. If this array includes
the value of the `frequency` property, it will be pre-selected in the form.

**Example:** `["7d", ".5m", "1y"]`

attributes.name: designation
attributes.description:
Optional donation designation(s). The form will serialize and pass this value to the cart
on submission. This value is deliberately not limited to the predefined options:
whatever you set it to will show up in the cart.

**Example:** `"Medical Care"`
**Example:** `["Medical Care", "Daily Meals"]`

attributes.name: designations
attributes.description:
Optional donation designation(s) variants. If this property is set,
the form will render the designation selection interface: multiple choice
if `designation` is an array and a single choice otherwise. All values overlapping
with the `designation` property will be pre-selected in the form.

**Example:** `["Medical Care", "Daily Meals", "Area of Greatest Need"]`

attributes.name: comment
attributes.description:
Optional comment accompanying the donation. If set (even to an empty string),
the form will render a comment field. The value of this property will be updated
as the customer enters their message and will be added to the order as a custom field in the end.

**Example:** `""`

attributes.name: anonymity
attributes.description:
Optional switch controlling visibility of the anonymity checkbox. If set to `true`, the form
will render the checkbox. All changes in the value are reflected to the attribute.

**Example:** `true`

attributes.name: anonymous
attributes.description:
Optional switch marking this donation as anonymous via a custom field when set to `true`. When
the anonymity checkbox is rendered, also checks or unchecks it depending on the value.
All changes in the value are reflected to the attribute.

**Example:** `true`

attributes.name: image
attributes.description:
Optional product image URL (absolute path). This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"https://picsum.photos/320"`

attributes.name: code
attributes.description:
Optional product code for this donation. This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"ISBN 978-0-12-345678-9"`

attributes.name: url
attributes.description:
Optional product URL for this donation. Accepts a full URL to the product page, starting
with `http://` or `https://`, or a relative path to the produt from the store's
domain (as configured in the store settings). This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"https://example.com/my-product"`

attributes.name: cart
attributes.description:
Optional cart
If set to 'add' will add items to the cart and, on submit, user is redirected to the cart.
If set to 'checkout', the default, on submit user is redirected to checkout directly

attributes.name: empty
attributes.description:
Optional empty
If set to 'true' clears the contents of the cart prior to adding the donation to the cart
If set to 'reset' clears the contents of the cart and cookies prior to adding the donation to the cart

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Optional target to display the form response.

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

attributes.name: ns
attributes.description:
The namespace to look for the translations in. We use this property to
sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

**Example:** `"usd"`

properties.name: anonymity
properties.description:
Optional switch controlling visibility of the anonymity checkbox. If set to `true`, the form

**Example:** `true`

properties.name: anonymous
properties.description:
Optional switch marking this donation as anonymous via a custom field when set to `true`. When

All changes in the value are reflected to the attribute.

**Example:** `true`

properties.name: image
properties.description:
Optional product image URL (absolute path). This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"https://picsum.photos/320"`

properties.name: code
properties.description:
Optional product code for this donation. This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"ISBN 978-0-12-345678-9"`

properties.name: url
properties.description:
Optional product URL for this donation. Accepts a full URL to the product page, starting

domain (as configured in the store settings). This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"https://example.com/my-product"`

properties.name: cart
properties.description:
Optional cart
If set to 'add' will add items to the cart and, on submit, user is redirected to the cart.
If set to 'checkout', the default, on submit user is redirected to checkout directly

properties.name: empty

If set to 'true' clears the contents of the cart prior to adding the donation to the cart
If set to 'reset' clears the contents of the cart and cookies prior to adding the donation to the cart

properties.name: lang

Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new

**Example:** `"en"`

properties.name: ns

**Example:** `"admin"`

events.name: change
events.description: Instance of `Donation.events.change`. Emitted after user input triggers a change in the form data.

events.name: submit
events.description: Instance of `Donation.events.submit`. Emitted when the form is submitted. Cancelling this event will stop the submission.

slots.name: amount
slots.description: Space below the amount selector, if it's visible.

slots.name: designation
slots.description: Space below the designation selector, if it's visible.

slots.name: comment
slots.description: Space below the comment field, if it's visible.

tags.name: foxy-quick-form
tags.description: A custom element providing a customizable donation form.

attributes.name: store
attributes.description:
**Required** store subdomain, It is similar to mystore.foxycart.com,
unless you use a custom subdomain.

**Examples:** `"mystore.foxycart.com"` `"custom.mycoolstore.com"`

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description:
**Required** 3-letter lowercase currency code.

**Example:** `"usd"`

attributes.name: sub_frequency
attributes.description:
Optional frequency string encoded as count (integer) + units (one of: `d`
for days, `w` for weeks, `m` for months, `y` for years). A special value
for twice a month is also supported: `.5m`. If set, the form will create a
subscription with the specified frequency in the cart.

**Example:** `"1m"`

attributes.name: sub_startdate
attributes.description:
Optional subscription start date encoded as four integer for the year, two
for the month and two for the day. If only two or one digits are provided,
it is assumed to be next occurence of that day of the month, from the
current date.

For more options https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

** Example:** `"10"`

attributes.name: sub_enddate
attributes.description:
Optional subscription end date encoded as four integer for the year, two
for the month and two for the day.

The absence of a sub_enddate, together with a sub_frequency, means a
subscription with indefinite and date.

For more options https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

** Example:** `"20221010"`

attributes.name: frequencies
attributes.description:
Optional frequency variants in the same format as `frequency`. If this property is set,
the form will render the frequency selection interface. If this array includes
the value of the `frequency` property, it will be pre-selected in the form.

**Example:** `["7d", ".5m", "1y"]`

attributes.name: products
attributes.description:
Optional an array of Product objects with at least the following properties:
- name: the name of the product
- price: the price of each of this product
The following optional properties will be used:
- quantity: (defaults to 1) how many of each product are added to the form
- image: an image url to be displayed in the form for this product
- products: an array of other products that are to be treated as bundled with this product
- signatures: an object containing a key value list of previously generated HMAC validation codes

Other product properties are accepted and sent to foxy cart.
https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

attributes.name: ns
attributes.description:
The namespace to look for the translations in. We use this property to
sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

properties.name: store
properties.description:
**Required** store subdomain, It is similar to mystore.foxycart.com,
unless you use a custom subdomain.

**Examples:** `"mystore.foxycart.com"` `"custom.mycoolstore.com"`

properties.name: currency
properties.description:
**Required** 3-letter lowercase currency code.

**Example:** `"usd"`

properties.name: sub_frequency
properties.description:
Optional frequency string encoded as count (integer) + units (one of: `d`
for days, `w` for weeks, `m` for months, `y` for years). A special value
for twice a month is also supported: `.5m`. If set, the form will create a
subscription with the specified frequency in the cart.

**Example:** `"1m"`

current date.

For more options https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

** Example:** `"10"`

properties.description:
Optional subscription end date encoded as four integer for the year, two
for the month and two for the day.

The absence of a sub_enddate, together with a sub_frequency, means a
subscription with indefinite and date.

For more options https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

** Example:** `"20221010"`

properties.description:

**Example:** `["7d", ".5m", "1y"]`

properties.name: products
properties.description:
Optional an array of Product objects with at least the following properties:
- name: the name of the product
- price: the price of each of this product
The following optional properties will be used:
- quantity: (defaults to 1) how many of each product are added to the form
- image: an image url to be displayed in the form for this product
- products: an array of other products that are to be treated as bundled with this product
- signatures: an object containing a key value list of previously generated HMAC validation codes

Other product properties are accepted and sent to foxy cart.
https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products#a_complete_list_of_product_parameters

properties.name: total
properties.description: The total value of the items to be submitted.

properties.name: lang
properties.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

properties.name: ns
properties.description:
The namespace to look for the translations in. We use this property to
sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

slots.name: products
slots.description: products to be added to the form.

tags.name: foxy-item
tags.description:
This component allows a user to configure a product.

The product may be configured using HTML properties or a JS object.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
**Required** the name of the product.

**Example:** `"Handmade Scarf"`

attributes.name: price
attributes.description:
**Required** the price of a unit of this item

**Example:** `10`

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description:
3-letter lowercase currency code.
It is provided by the form if not set.

**Example:** `"usd"`

attributes.name: image
attributes.description: Optional an image url to be displayed in the form.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: Optional the alt text for the image

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: Optional an image url to be displayed in the foxy cart once the custumer reaches the cart.

attributes.name: code
attributes.description:
Optional product code. This property affects cart UI only.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"ISBN 978-0-12-345678-9"`

attributes.name: parent_code
attributes.description:
Optional parent code. This property affects cart UI only.
It causes Foxy Cart to recognize the parent-child relationship between two products.

Nested products set this property automatically.

**Example:** `"ISBN 978-0-12-345678-9"`

attributes.name: quantity
attributes.description: **Required** The quantity of this product in the cart.

attributes.name: quantity_max
attributes.description: Optional quantity max. The maximum number of items of these to be added.

attributes.name: quantity_min
attributes.description: Optional quantity min. The minimum number of items of these to be added.

attributes.name: category
attributes.description:
Optional category. Sets the category this product is in.
See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `"heavy"`

attributes.name: expires
attributes.description:
Optional expires. Sets the expiration time of this product.

Advanced usage only: This property affects cart UI only.
This web component will not react to this property.

The product cannot be purchased after expiration, but if it is part of a
subscription, it remains in the subscription as long as it stands.

See [Products](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/products) wiki for more details.

**Example:** `15`

attributes.name: weight
attributes.description: Optional per product weight. This property affects cart UI only.

attributes.name: shipto
attributes.description:
Optional. Specify a ship-to address for a specific product.

Advanced usage only: This property affects cart UI only.
This element does not provide any means for the user to specify this property.

attributes.name: products
attributes.description:
Optional. An array of child products.

Each child product is an object that can have any of the public properties of this element.
Child elements will be created accordingly.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Optional. The description for a product.

attributes.name: signatures
attributes.description:
Optional open: An Object with key, value pairs where the key is a product
attribute and the value is a previously computed HMAC validation code.

**Important security information:** this web component does not generate or validates the HMAC validation code.
Please, refer to [the Product Verification page](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/hmac_validation) for more information and tools for generating the codes.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description:
Optional open: An Object with key, value pairs where the key is a product
attribute and the value is a boolean indicating that the property is editable by the user.

**Advanced use only**: this web component does not provide means for the user to alter product attributes.

See [Product Verification](https://wiki.foxycart.com/v/2.0/hmac_validation) for more information.

attributes.name: length
attributes.description: Optional length.  This property affects cart UI only.

attributes.name: width
attributes.description: Optional width.  This property affects cart UI only.

attributes.name: height
attributes.description: Optional height.  This property affects cart UI only.

attributes.name: total
attributes.description:
The total price of this product.

It takes into account child products and the quantity.

attributes.name: pid
attributes.description: A unique id set to the product. Advanced usage only.

attributes.name: lang
attributes.description:
Contains the language this component presents its translatable
content in. Assigning a value to this property will load new
translations in background and trigger a render afterwards.

**Example:** `"en"`

attributes.name: ns
attributes.description:
The namespace to look for the translations in. We use this property to
sync namespace settings with the parent element and it's highly unlikely
that you'll ever need to set or read it in your code.

**Example:** `"admin"`

properties.name: name
properties.description:
**Required** the name of the product.

**Example:** `"Handmade Scarf"`

properties.name: price
properties.description:
**Required** the price of a unit of this item

**Example:** `10`

properties.name: currency
properties.description:
3-letter lowercase currency code.
It is provided by the form if not set.

**Example:** `"usd"`

properties.name: image
properties.description: Optional an image url to be displayed in the form.

properties.name: alt
properties.description: Optional the alt text for the image

properties.name: url
properties.description: Optional an image url to be displayed in the foxy cart once the custumer reaches the cart.

**Example:** `"admin"`

cssParts.name: picture
cssParts.description: Image of the product in preview stack (for single products) or grid (for bundles).
